Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory375.png'}
{3: 'Roland leaves Cerberus and walks out of the town. He then arrives at the ruins underneath the mountain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Goddamn Lamia...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland expected her to run, but she did it at a very awkward time.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, he was able to use Cerberus to contain Voodoo, taking only an acceptable amount of damage. He got what he wanted.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Hope our Cerberus friends aren't too shocked when they find out the truth.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He smiles.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Well, it will be too late for them anyway.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He has returned to the wasteland. But this time, he has a purpose.'}
{3: 'Once again, the girl in black shows up in front of him—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'You there, come with me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory378.png'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Come with me, please.'}
{3: 'The girl did not reply. She only looks at him calmly.'}
{3: 'Roland sees no emotion or demand in her eyes. They look like a deep lake engulfed in fog.'}
{3: '—He does not like those eyes.'}
{3: 'She does not answer.'}
{3: 'Roland strolls forward as he is about to leave the girl behind.'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'This is what you wanted.', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Roland pauses his steps.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...How do you know? Wait, no...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Not just in the house, you have been tracking me since long ago, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Cinderelik didn't deny."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "State your offer. After all this drama, I don't think we need to test each other any further.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "That's not my mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl turns away in silence and heads out.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...Tsk, whatever.', 4: '2'}
{3: "But Roland isn't going to simply follow her."}
{3: 'He has his own plans.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory12.jpg'}
{3: 'Roland follows Cinderelik over a long way in silence, until the nearby scenery has completely changed.'}
{3: 'He walks over many deserted towns, buildings and bastions destroyed by Corrupted and human weapons.'}
{3: 'But no matter how he tries to talk to Cinderelik, she never answers.'}
{3: 'Roland even brought Corrupted from afar to attack her, or set up traps along the way—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: "Don't do unnecessary things.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl says calmly.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Her words contain no "request" or "restriction," but Roland feels they are more dangerous than straight-forward threatening like "the consequences are dire."'}
{3: 'Her real strength is still a mystery, but from what she has displayed, she still has lots of cards to play.'}
{3: 'In that case, he can only continue to follow.'}
{3: 'With this in mind, Roland keeps walking after her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Please.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland has lost track of time. He is already used to the strange pattern of changing scenes along the way.'}
{3: 'Cinderelik stops at a high-rise building ruin. She orders a few Corrupted to push away a heavy piece of building wreckage.'}
{1: '1', 3: '—This has to be it, Roland thinks.'}
{3: 'After countless detours along the way to make Roland unable to find out the exact location.'}
{3: 'Now that he is finally here, it is all over.'}
{3: 'Maybe snipers have taken aim on him for a hundred times.'}
{3: 'But this is the end.'}
{3: 'At least they want him to come here, Roland thinks.'}
{3: '—So he follows Cinderelik into the large ruins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory18.jpg'}
{3: 'The road inside is wide, but almost all light is absorbed by the ruins.'}
{3: 'He can only see Cinderelik walking past dappled light spots.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "(No, she's not the only one.)", 4: '1'}
{3: "Someone is watching him. Actually, there's more than one. No less than two digits."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "(It's getting busy here...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'But they are only watching.'}
{3: 'Roland would have prepared himself if they were "aiming" or "preparing to attack."'}
{3: 'But he doesn\'t know how to respond to this neutral "observation."'}
{3: 'He senses a familiar sight—it must be that "Voodoo" female.'}
{3: "She would have attacked him without hesitation. But Roland doesn't feel it."}
{3: 'Is she under someone\'s control? Did anyone order her to "not attack"?'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Whoever is behind all this, he makes a pretty good dog trainer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland purposely makes a taunting statement.'}
{3: 'Is this simple taunt going to work? Roland wonders.'}
{3: 'There is no response. The watchers are still eying on him, while Cinderelik continues to walk without a word.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{3: 'Roland sees a lit-up area in front.'}
{3: 'The inside of the ruin is mostly dark. Only that area is lit up by the sunlight from above.'}
{3: '—Almost like a spotlight on stage.'}
{3: 'A black figure is standing in the spot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Mr. Vonnegut, the guest has arrived.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns back, facing Cinderelik and Roland.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Glad to meet you, Roland, a "knight" who lost his master.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I am Vonnegut.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Now that you have made your way here, I can give you my straight forward promise.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Come work for me. I can make your wish come true.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "If that's the case, I trust you can understand that I have no interest in these social concepts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Why don't we cut to the chase?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland makes a bold statement. He isn't keen to get himself overly involved."}
{3: 'After all, he only came because he wanted to find out if they had the thing he longed for.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I can give you what you want.', 4: '1'}
